Settings.Name: Downscaling
Settings.Tooltip: Downlevel NPC's which are above the Party Level.

Settings.Name: LevelBonus
Settings.Tooltip:
Scale NPC's to Party Level + X.
Set to a large negative with 'Downscaling' disabled to stop level scaling.

Settings.Name: HP
Settings.Tooltip: Increase HP by X + Constitution Modifier each scaled level.

Settings.Name: PercentHP
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase HP by X% each scaled level.
0.05 means each enemy recieves a 5% max health bonus.

Settings.Name: AC
Settings.Tooltip: Increase AC by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Initiative
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Initiative by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Physical
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Physical Ability Score by X each scaled level, based on its highest physical stat.
( Strength or Dexterity )

Settings.Name: Casting
Settings.Tooltip:
Increase Casting Ability Score by X each scaled level, based on its spellcasting stat.
( Intelligence, Charisma, or Wisdom )

Settings.Name: Strength
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Strength Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Tooltip: Increase Dexterity Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Constitution
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Constitution Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Tooltip: Increase Intelligence Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Wisdom
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Wisdom Ability Score by X each scaled level.

Settings.Name: Charisma
Settings.Tooltip: Increase Charisma Ability Score by X each scaled level.
